author: Paul Rankin
method: Heat the oil in the wok and stir fry the garlic, chilli and onion together for 2 minutes. Add the prawns and stir fry for a further 2 minutes. Add the sugar snaps and carrot and stir fry for 2 more minutes. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve the stir-fry on a warm plate and sprinkle over the chopped coriander.
ingredients: 1 tbsp vegetable oil,  1 clove garlic, finely chopped,  ½ fresh red chilli, finely chopped,  ½ onion, finely sliced,  5 king prawns, peeled, tails left on,  100g/3½oz sugar snaps, blanched,  1 carrot, peeled and sliced into ribbons with a vegetable peeler,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tsp chopped coriander
